member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute
member.summary: Attribute for defining a LUIS Action Binding.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Construct the LUIS Action Binding.
member.param: The LUIS Intent name that triggers this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute.CanExecuteWithNoContext
member.summary: Indicates if the action can be executed without previous context. This is recommended for sub-actions that can change some variable of the current context. Default value is True.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute.ConfirmOnSwitchingContext
member.summary: Should ask user before switching action and discarding current action's context.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute.FriendlyName
member.summary: Text used when asking to switch context.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute.IntentName
member.summary: The LUIS Intent name that triggers this action.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingParamAttribute
member.summary: Attribute for mapping Action Parameters to extracted LUIS entities.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingParamAttribute.CustomType
member.summary: The LUIS Custom entity type name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingParamAttribute.BuiltinType
member.summary: The LUIS Prebuilt entity type name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingParamAttribute.Order
member.summary: Specificy order when asking user to fill-in parameter values.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.BaseLuisAction
member.summary: Base class for implementing LUIS Action Bindings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.BaseLuisAction.FulfillAsync
member.summary: The method to be executed when all required parameters are filled. This method should fulfill or call any external services and return the result.
member.returns: The result of the action execution.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.BaseLuisAction.IsValid(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult}@)
member.summary: Validates if the current action's context is valid, based on the Action properties set so far and their validation attributes.
member.returns: True if context is valid, False otherwise.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.BaseLuisContextualAction`1
member.summary: Base class for implementing LUIS Action Bindings that can modify the context of other actions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.BaseLuisContextualAction`1.Context
member.summary: The original action being modified.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver
member.summary: Handles retrieving an Action Binding based on the matched intent from the input utterance, validates parameter based on extracted entities.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Construct LuisActionResolver instance.
member.param: List of assemblies where to find Action Bindings Types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.AssignValue(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Tries to assign a value to the action's parameter. This method runs the proper validation according to the action's parameter definition.
member.param: The parameter to try to assign.
member.returns: True if validation passes and the value was assigned. False if validation or type compatibility fails.

member.summary: Tries to extract intent and entities from the input utterance and validates if the the current parameter should be updated or if a context switch is needed.
member.param: Instance of Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Luis.ILuisService to use for extracting intent and entities.
The parameter to try to assign.
Optional: EntityExtractor to disambiguate multiple values into a single one.
member.returns: Indicates if the Action Parameter was validated (and set) or a if a Context Switch should occur.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.GetActionDefinition(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction)
member.summary: Gets the Action definition from an action instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.GetParameterDefinition(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Action Parameter definition from an action instance and parameter name.

member.summary: If the action is contextual and related to the current context action, set the contextual action to the current context.
member.param: Indicates if the contextual action is related to the current action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.UpdateIfValidContextualAction(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: If the action is contextual and related to the current context action, set the contextual action to the current context.
member.param: Indicates if the contextual action is related to the current action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.IsContextualAction(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction)
member.summary: Indicates if the action is contextual to another action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.CanStartWithNoContextAction(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionBindingAttribute@)
member.summary: Indicates if the action can be started, either is not a contextual action or it can create the contextual action directly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.BuildContextForContextualAction(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.ILuisAction,System.String@)
member.summary: Builds the action from a contextual action.
member.param: The LUIS intent name of the parent action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.CognitiveServices.LuisActionBinding.LuisActionResolver.ResolveActionFromLuisIntent(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Luis.Models.LuisResult)
member.summary: Returns an action based on the LUIS intent.
member.param: The LUIS Result containing intent and extracted entities.
member.returns: The matched action plus its parameters filled with the extracted entities, or Null if no action was matched.

member.summary: Returns an action based on the LUIS intent.
member.param: The LUIS Result containing intent and extracted entities.
Optional: EntityExtractor to disambiguate multiple values into a single one.
member.returns: The matched action plus its parameters filled with the extracted entities, or Null if no action was matched.

member.summary: Get the first datetimeV2 resolution value.
member.returns: A Dictionary with the resolution values Or null.
